item.title: Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) Lesson
item.description: Link to SDG Lesson Slides (Draft) Title: Understanding Engineers Australia’s Code of Ethics Link: https://www.mentimeter.com/app/presentation/alpaomqq5gzywq3u56n2zjsi6ygc8osq Resources Sustainable Development Goals (Goal 9): https://sdgs.un.org/goals/goal9 Engineers Australia Code of Ethics: https://www.engineersaustralia.org.au/sites/default/files/2022-08/code-ethics-guidelines-professional-conduct-2022.pdf

item.title: About
item.description: About Me - Andy Huynh Education Doctor of Philosophy in Mechanical Engineering (2021 - Current) University of Western Australia Master of Professional Engineering in Mechanical Engineering (2019 - 2021) University of Western Australia Bachelor of Science in Engineering Science and Accounting (2016 - 2018) University of Western Australia Employment Academic Teaching (2021 - Current) University of Western Australia Research Assistant (2020 - 2021) Intelligent Systems for Medicine Laboratory Achievements William and Marlene Schrader Prize in Biomedical Engineering - Prize $2,000 Awarded to the student who achieved the highest mark in the field of biomedical engineering.

item.title: Reflections on Learning and Teaching
item.description: Lesson 1: Setting the Scene Lesson 2: Active Learning Strategies for Collaborative Small Group Teaching Lesson 3: Designing a High-Impact Digital Learning Experience in the Online Classroom Lesson 4: Assessment and Feedback Lesson 5: Intercultural Agility and Inclusive Teaching
